Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.handlers

package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.handlers
Provides specialised handlers that use the Open Metadata Store Services client. These handlers provide the common function that serves the view services REST APIs and the client contents of the connectors. Most of the function is located in the base class. This is possible because the return class is typically an OpenMetadataRoot element that uses polymorphism to support all types of entity property beans (OpenMetadataRootProperties). This is enabled through common builders (incoming properties) and converters (return values) that work up and down the type/bean inheritance hierarchy.
